data.prayer: Lord, make the 514,320 believers in Guanajuato to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 4,393,780 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Guanajuato, Mexico
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Guanajuato, Mexico to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.section_summary: On average, 8 babies will be born in the next hour to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Guanajuato, Mexico.
data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself real to these new families.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Guanajuato, Mexico.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 514,320 believers in Guanajuato to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.
Lord, please remember the Jew, Spanish-speaking people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 4,908,100 people living in the state of Guanajuato.
Father, for those in trouble in the state of Guanajuato prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 514,320 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.
